attributes.action: Scrap child maintenance if the mother doesn’t allow dad to see child
attributes.additional_details: It will push the mums to allow the dad to see their children, a massive improvement on dads mental health.
attributes.background: If the mum stops he dad seeing their children without a court order, she should not be allowed to claim child maintenance

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/719152
